passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(11) > header > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > a > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(12) > div > div > div > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(12) > div > div > div > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(13) > section > footer > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > a > h1:nth-child(1)
